name: Nuke 'Em
description:
Welcom to Nuke 'Em! A game all about juice and getting those nasty punks off your lawn.

Instructions:

Use mana that you earn both from downed enemies and passive income to buy weapons.

To buy weapons hover/click the buttons in the bottom left, or use hotkeys as pictured in-game (Z, X, C).

Don't let the baddies touch yo' house.

Screenshot your highscore and put it in the comments!

Credits:

Music by David Renda on FStudios.com (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6)

Sound effect by me in SFXR

All art and code by me, using Aseprite, and the Monogame framework.
